metadata.description: While best known for his critically acclaimed series Y: The Last Man, Ex Machina, Saga, Runaways, Paper Girls and more, Eisner Award-winning comics legend Brian K. Vaughan has also left an impact on DC’s greatest heroes. Vaughan’s work has reached all corners of the DC Universe, from the close quarters of Titans Tower to the cities and wildlands of the planet Rann to the moon-bound halls of the Justice League Watchtower.
metadata.name: The DC Universe by Brian K. Vaughan
